double pointed needle you to achieve gauge sm - stitch marker etsy rundleknittingco etsy com | instagram @rundleknitting | ravelry rundle knitting © rundle knitting co 1 some notes on yarn this pattern is super flexible in terms of what yarn you decide to use in the development and testing of this pattern a number of different yarns and yarn combinations were used below are some more detailed descriptions of yarns used that are intended to help you in yourdecisionmakingofwhattouseandhowmuch you ll need super bulky yarn the hat on the cover page of this pattern was knitted using a combination of super bulky weight yarns from leo and roxy and myself that are similar in thickness to malabrigo rasta or crazy sexy wool from wool and the gang another super bulky yarn that was used by a test knitter was dreamland by knit collage which gave the hat an interesting texture but sister yarn and spun cloud would also be fun options for this toque i knit a size 2 34 rounds of ribbing before starting decrease rounds and used a total of 185 g of yarn below i have listed the colours from bottomtotop and include the amount used in grams using a food scale to measure the length used in metres and yards and the size of the section it was used for amount length colour rounds 85 g 39 m 43 yd green black 16 rounds + c/o 57 g 26 m
